author: Esther Emma
content:
a taste of honey
i love the golden touch in this one
it has to do with the fresh morning light that is so special for this time of year
the time of new beginning
the time of refreshing
the time of new chances

you say it is the lens, but i think it is the light
some days you have that special light
and you can't get enough making pictures
but maybe i'm wrong it is the lens too
the lens and the light ðŸ™‚

have a nice day, andreas
